entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.

High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes.
